Fulu Mugovhani (amụrụ 7 Septemba 1990 na Thohoyandou) bụ onye ome ihe nkiri nke South Africa

N'afọ 2015, o gosipụtara na Ayanda dị ka njirimara aha, ọrụ nke nwetara ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù na nhọpụta gụnyere Africa Movie Academy Awards, South African Film and Television Awards na Africa International Film Festival Awards.
A mụrụ Mugovhani na Thohoyandou, obodo dị na mpaghara Limpopo nke South Africa
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri egwu na Tshwane University of Technology, ebe nna ya kuziri, na-agụcha akara mmụta ya na 2011
Ọ lụrụ di ịhụnanya ya bụ, Timi Modibedi, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka DJ na onye na- edekọ ihe, na June 2018
Na 2012, Mugovhani sonyeere na mmepụta mba ụwa nke  egwu bụ The Lion King, nke Hong Kong Disneyland mepụtara, na-arụ ọrụ nke Nala
Maka mmepụta na ihe ngosi a ọ kwagara Hong Kong maka otu afọ na ọkara
Na 2013, ọ rutere ọrụ mbụ ya na orụ telivishọn, na-eme ihe na obere usoro Remix,  yana ime ihe na soap opera bụ Scandal!
Na 2015, gosipụtara dị ka onye ndu ọrụ nke ihe nkiri Ayanda, nke Sara Blecher duziri

Ọrụ a nwetara ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù, gụnyere onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na onyinye onye ndu na 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards,  onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri na 10th South African Film and Television Awards,   na ihe nrite onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2015 Africa International Film Festival
Na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards, a họpụtara ya maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ihe nkiri, ma o meriri
Na 2017, Mugovhani nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ihe omume soap opera bụ Isidingo na SABC 3
Ọzọkwa, n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbara na soap opera Ring of Lies na ọrụ dị ka Rendani, onye agha Musangwe nke na-agbaso nchọ ya ịghọ onye mmeri ọkpọ, n'agbanyeghị ọchịchọ nna ya na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe
Na 2020, ka ọ kwụsịtụrụ otu afọ, ọ gbara n'usoro ihe nkiri Still Breathing, ebe ọ gosipụtara dị ka nne na nwunye na nke mbụ,  na na ihe nkiri nrọ ọchị nke South Africa bụ Seriously Single
Mugovhani ekwuola na N'ajụjụ ọnụ na e nwere ihe dị iche na-eme na ogbo ya na ihuenyo, mkpa ikwupụta olu ya dị iche iche
Nke a gbara ya aka mgbe ọ gbanwere site na ụlọ ihe nkiri gaa na telivishọn na ihe nkiri, tinyekwara nke mere ka o siere ya ike ịme ihe na ogbo mgbe ọ mechara ihe nkiri
